title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Integrating AI Feedback in Instructional Design to Enhance Collaborative Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose problems occurring in collaborative learning processes at least three times and propose improvement strategies using AI-based learning analytics tools.
Learners can improve their participation in collaborative learning by 20% or more by comparing peer feedback with AI-generated feedback.
Learners can develop learner-tailored collaborative strategies at least twice using AI predictive models when designing science education projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
